mapper.select: select qnaSeq, subject, userid, regDate, status from qnaBoard order by qnaSeq desc

select count(*) from member where status in (1,0)
and lower(${searchType}) like '%' || lower(#{searchWord}) || '%'

select rno, noticeSeq, subject, regDate from ( select rownum as rno, noticeSeq, subject, regDate from ( select noticeSeq, subject, to_char(regDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS regDate from noticeBoard order by noticeSeq desc ) V )T where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

select rno, infoSeq, subject, regDate from ( select rownum as rno, infoSeq, subject, regDate from ( select infoSeq, subject, to_char(regDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS regDate from infoBoard order by infoSeq desc ) V )T where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}
